:orphan:



.. _sphx_glr_auto_examples:

Gallery of Examples
===================

Test examples.

.. _sphx_glr_auto_examples_future:

:orphan:

Future examples
===============

Examples that use ``__future__``.



.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Test that __future__ imports inside sphinx_gallery modules does not affect the parsing of this ...">

.. only:: html

 .. figure:: /auto_examples/future/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_future_imports_broken_thumb.png
     :alt: Test without __future__ imports

     :ref:`sphx_glr_auto_examples_future_plot_future_imports_broken.py`

.. raw:: html

    </div>


.. toctree::
   :hidden:

   /auto_examples/future/plot_future_imports_broken

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="This example tests that __future__ imports works across cells.">

.. only:: html

     :alt: Test __future__ imports across cells

     :ref:`sphx_glr_auto_examples_future_plot_future_imports.py`

.. raw:: html

    </div>

   :hidden:

   /auto_examples/future/plot_future_imports

  .. container:: sphx-glr-download sphx-glr-download-jupyter

    :download:`Download all examples in Jupyter notebooks: auto_examples_jupyter.zip </auto_examples/auto_examples_jupyter.zip>`
